about.title: About Me
about.description: I am an Electrical & Electronics Engineer with a passion for embedded systems and circuit design. I have experience in developing various projects using microcontrollers, sensors, and power electronics components. I am currently pursuing my master's degree in Electrical Engineering at Istanbul Technical University, focusing on power electronics and control systems.
about.paragraph1: I am an Electrical-Electronics Engineer with a strong academic background from Abdullah Gül University. My passion lies in embedded systems and circuit design, where I combine theoretical knowledge with practical problem-solving skills.
about.paragraph2: With a focus on real-world applications, I specialize in developing innovative solutions that bridge the gap between hardware and software. My experience spans from microcontroller programming to complex circuit design and system integration.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Here are some of my notable projects

project1.title: Strain Sensor System for Motion Detection
project1.description: Developed a motion detection system using strain sensors and ESP8266, with simulation and analysis in LTspice and Matlab.

project2.title: Real-Time Breathing Monitor
project2.description: Created a breathing monitoring system with custom circuit design and MATLAB GUI interface for real-time visualization.

project3.title: PID Line Following Robot
project3.description: Implemented a PID-controlled line following robot using STM32 and Arduino, featuring precise motion control and sensor integration.

project4.title: VHDL-based Vending Machine
project4.description: Designed and simulated a vending machine system using VHDL, implementing state machines and digital logic circuits.

project5.title: 3-phase Transformer Design
project5.description: Optimized 3-phase transformer design using ANSYS Maxwell for electromagnetic simulation and analysis.

project6.title: 2000W PM Motor Optimization
project6.description: Performed optimization of a 2000W permanent magnet motor using ANSYS and MATLAB for performance analysis.

project7.title: Göktaş AGV
project7.description: Led the development of an autonomous guided vehicle for Teknofest competition, achieving finalist status.
